derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from super- 'exceptional' + man, coined by G. B. Shaw in imitation of German Übermensch (used by Nietzsche)

entry.tran: 超人;有非凡才能的人;体能超群的人
entry.def: A superman is a man who has very great physical or mental abilities.

example.ex: Collor nurtured the idea that he was a superman, who single-handedly could resolve Brazil's crisis.
example.tran: 科洛尔一直希望自己有超凡能力，凭一己之力就能解决巴西的危机。
